QuestData.Title: Flush Them Out
QuestData.Description: They lurk in the shadows, in the salt-soaked caverns. The dark brine beneath the pure gleam of the surface.$b$bI have seen them. They plague my dreams, their whispers are maddening. They speak of their master, clawing at the barrier...$b$bSearch the cliffs for their warrens. Find what lurks within and obliterate them all.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate and defeat what lies within 4 structures in the Forgotten Cove.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ignorance of our enemy will invariably lead to defeat.
QuestData.RewardText: The things are driven back, for a time.
